desc: Students focus intensively on the dance forms and styles of selected cultures chosen by the instructor in consultation with the students. Prerequisite: Dance 109, 124, or permission of instructor. Offered occasionally, including Spring Semester, 2008-2009.
name: Intl Dance II
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Dance 109, 124, or permission of instructor. Offered occasionally, including Spring Semester, 2008-2009.
title: International Dance II: Selected Dance Cultures
